casebody.data:
Belknap,

Dec. 3, 1925. Charles L. Pulsifer & a., Trustees, v. Laconia. Thomas P. Cheney, for the plaintiffs. Stanton Owen, for the defendant. Peaslee, C. J.

The trustees are advised that the income of the fund should be paid to the city, to be used for “the enlargement and beautifying the Public Park” in which the library is located.

Case discharged.

All concurred.
